index.name: Paul Zolnierczyk
index.bio: Paul is a software engineer with over 10 years of development experience.  Currently he is a Sr. Software Engineer and Team Lead at Infinity Interactive designing and developing client solutions in Java and .NET.  A two time Xamarin Certified Developer, Paul's most recent passion is spreading the word on cross-platform mobile app development with Xamarin.
index.title: Paul Zolnierczyk | Speakers | MKE DOT NET
